alert.note: Alert for Sioux (North Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 11 at 8:45PM CDT until further notice by NWS Bismarck
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in North Dakota... Cannonball River at Breien affecting Sioux and Morton Counties. ...FLOOD WARNING FOR SNOWMELT IN EFFECT UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and is forecast to continue. * WHERE...Cannonball River at Breien. * WHEN...Until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 9.0 feet, Water overflows north bank. At 12.0 feet, Water overflows south bank. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:15 PM CDT Tuesday /6:15 PM MDT Tuesday/ the stage was 11.4 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall to near flood stage on Wednesday, then rise again to a crest of 11.9 feet on Friday. - Flood stage is 10.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 11.9 feet on 03/13/1996. &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
